summary: A disgruntled veteran recruits a group of disgraced colleagues to perform a bank robbery with military precision.
cast: Jack Hawkins|Nigel Patrick|Roger Livesey|Richard Attenborough|Bryan Forbes|Kieron Moore|Terence Alexander|Norman Bird|Robert Coote|Melissa Stribling|Nanette Newman|Lydia Sherwood|Doris Hare|David Lodge|Patrick Wymark|Gerald Harper|Brian Murray|Beverly Bennett|Marie Burke|Cyril Chamberlain|Michael Corcoran|Terence Edmond|Ernest Fennemore|Susanne Gibbs|Claire Gordon|Nigel Green|Patrick Jordan|Gerry Judge|Dinsdale Landen|Ronald Leigh-Hunt|Ned Lynch|Fred Machon|Cecil Paul|Terence Plummer|Oliver Reed|John Richardson|Norman Rossington|Pat Ryan|Bruce Seton|Tony Thawnton|Joe Wadham|Tony Wager|Pearl Walters
title: La Liga de los caballeros
